eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mono, CA; AT 01:39 PM ON NOV 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:39 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Evacuate immediately per the Mono County Sheriffs Office. Temporary evacuation points have been established at Mammoth Lakes Middle School and the Tri-County Fairgrounds in Bishop.
